name: Proto-Beat [Development Build]
description:
Proto-beat is a game being developed in devlog on youtube, builds will be periodically added here 

Development videos and devlogs for the game can be found here https://www.youtube.com/c/slugglove 

Proto-Beat is a semi-open world,  third person movement shooter style game.

Currently working with controller and keyboard

Version History

0.01A : 

  • First release of prototype
  • Test level
  • Multiple weapons added (pistol, submachine gun, shotgun, grenade launcher, rifle, dual pistols, Gatling gun)
  • Vehicle Basics added (scooter and truck vehicle)
  • Basic movement added
  • Grind Rails added
  • Vaulting added
  • Pole Spinning added
